tool_description: A realistic fake data API including users, addresses, vehicles, flights, airports, posts, etc.
name: FakeData
title: FakeData

api_list.name: Flight by id
api_list.description: Get a fake flight by id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fakedata4.p.rapidapi.com/flights/123"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fakedata4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fakedata4.p.rapidapi.com/flights/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fakedata4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
